entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
